column4: Is there an easy way to get ubuntu 6.10 to support my widescreen? I have a Dell 2005FPW and an ATi X800
Is there an easy way to get ubuntu 6.10 to support my widescreen? I have a Dell 2005FPW and an ATi X800
there are no widescreen resolutions available
you should install the proprietary ATI drivers. look here for how: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/BinaryDriverHowto
